name: memoria-sync
description: Memoria Sync kullanarak notlar覺n覺z覺 her cihazda versiyonlay覺n ve yedekleyin.

scripts.dev: mkdir -p dist && cp manifest.json dist/ && node esbuild.config.mjs
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp manifest.json dist/ && tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production
